channel.title: News and info about commercial drone technology: UAV, SUAS, Dronetech
channel.description: News and info about commercial drone technology: UAV, SUAS, Dronetech

item.title: DroneDeploy reaches industry milestone with new Volume Measurement tool
item.description:
DroneDeploy reaches industry milestone with new Volume Measurement tool

DroneDeploy has announced the release of its new Volume Measurement tool, set to transform the way industries from mining to manufacturing do business with drones. Amazon and Google's future delivery drones have been dominating the headlines, but the bigger untold story is that drones are already revolutionising business.

item.title: Drones could help grow crops that need less water
item.description:
Drones could help grow crops that need less water

A new facility at Purdue University will use drones to transform the agricultural sector, helping farmers stay on the front end of technology trends. The $10 million automated plant phenotyping facility will use unmanned aerial vehicles to study how genetics play into plants' performance in the field.

item.title: NASA licenses new communication technology for drones
item.description:
NASA licenses new communication technology for drones

NASA has developed technology that may enable unmanned aircraft to fly safely in the national airspace along with piloted aircraft. The American space agency has filed a patent for an integrated communications and control system that is capable of collision warnings, as well as real-time traffic and weather updates.

item.title: Top three trends for the commercial drone market in the next four years
item.description:
Top three trends for the commercial drone market in the next four years

Technavio has identified the top three emerging trends predicted to impact the growth of the commercial drone market from 2016 to 2020. The leading global technology research company has conducted a study that highlights the major trends set to take the commercial drone market by storm over the next four years.
